Posts.Content: ADAMFOX wrote: My mum wasdiagnosed with grade 2 BC after finding a 1.5cm lump. she had surgery last thursday and the results came back yesterday and thank god it has not affected any nodes or spread. This is the best news she has had for months. They have just now said she should have a bit of radio and will be ok (all things expected). I just wanted to say how much inspiration and knowledge i drew from this site. I have never ever posted on forums before but you all are the most amazing people who genuinely are an inspiration to loads. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: update from my mum ADAMFOX kcshreve
